job_tasks.phrase: Je voornaamste uitdaging is om samen met het team deze nieuwe technologieën om te zetten in een gebruiksvriendelijk en effectief product.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core task of translating new technologies (generative AI) into a functional product, which is a key aspect of software development and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Je zult samenwerken met onze UX designer/researcher, front-end developer en andere teamleden om snel prototypes te ontwikkelen.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights collaboration with other developers and designers to build prototypes, a common software development activity.

job_tasks.phrase: Daarbij zul je soms bereid moeten zijn om voor een snelle, testbare oplevering een minder elegante of schaalbare oplossing te accepteren.
job_tasks.justification: This indicates a pragmatic approach to software delivery, prioritizing speed and testability, which falls under software development practices.

job_tasks.phrase: Op basis van gebruikerstests verbeteren we deze prototypes vervolgens iteratief.
job_tasks.justification: Iterative improvement based on user testing is a standard software development lifecycle practice.

job_tasks.phrase: We zoeken een ontwikkelaar om toe te treden tot ons nieuwe team. Dit team werkt aan een product dat gebruikmaakt van generative AI-technologie om zorgverleners te ondersteunen bij logistieke processen.
job_tasks.justification: This sentence clearly defines the role as a developer working on a product that utilizes generative AI, fitting the 'AI-Adjacent Software Engineer' profile where AI is integrated into a product.

job_tasks.phrase: We zoeken een ervaren Software Developer met een passie voor (generative) AI?
job_tasks.justification: The job title and initial question explicitly state the role is a Software Developer with an interest in AI, aligning with Macro-Category A.

job_tasks.phrase: ervaring in backend en API ontwikkeling
job_tasks.justification: Backend and API development are core software engineering tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: Je kunt jouw kennis ook breder binnen de Data Science groep inzetten en daarmee kun je naast het exploratieve werk ook bijdragen aan het verbeteren of uitbreiden van bestaande oplossingen.
job_tasks.justification: Contributing to improving or expanding existing solutions is a software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: hoe je nieuwe technologieën als generative AI en conversational agents kunt inzetten
job_tasks.justification: This phrase refers to the application of generative AI and conversational agents, which can involve model development or fine-tuning, but the primary focus of the ad is on integrating these into a product.

job_tasks.phrase: om zorgverleners te ondersteunen bij logistieke processen.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the business problem the AI is intended to solve, indicating an understanding of business needs.

job_tasks.phrase: om zorgmedewerkers te ondersteunen bij logistieke vraagstukken.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the business context and the problem the AI solution aims to address.

soft_skills.phrase: bereidheid om nieuwe technologieën te leren en te implementeren.
soft_skills.justification: This directly expresses the need for a willingness to learn and implement new technologies.
This explicitly mentions problem-solving ability as a desired trait.

soft_skills.phrase: Je zult samenwerken met onze UX designer/researcher, front-end developer en andere teamleden
soft_skills.justification: This highlights the collaborative nature of the role, working with various team members.

soft_skills.phrase: fungeren als de spil in het team dat werkt aan cutting-edge producten met een focus op generative AI?
soft_skills.justification: Being the 'pivot' in a team working on cutting-edge products suggests a degree of ownership and innovation.

soft_skills.phrase: Afhankelijk van je ervaring is een combinatie met een meer leidinggevende rol binnen het nieuwe team ook een mogelijkheid.
soft_skills.justification: The possibility of a leadership role implies a need for ownership and initiative.
Curiosity is a strong indicator of a desire to learn and adapt.

profile.rationale: The job ad clearly positions the role as a Software Developer focused on building and integrating generative AI technology into a product. The primary tasks described (software development, API development, prototype creation, iterative improvement) fall under Macro-Category A. While generative AI is mentioned as the technology being used, the emphasis is on the software engineering aspects of product development rather than deep model development or specialization in GenAI techniques themselves. The role involves using AI as a component within a larger software product, fitting the definition of an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear about the core responsibilities being software development and integration, with generative AI being the technology focus. The language used directly maps to the definitions in the coding book, making the classification straightforward.
